version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Please don't forget to rate Blackbox on the App Store if you like the new update!

- Added support for new TVHeadend 3.9 API
- Added time based seeking for recordings (where available)
- Added jump 30 seconds forward/backward in recordings (where available)
- Added multi delete for timers
- Added multi delete for recordings
- Added multi download for recordings
- Added auto scroll to current channel in bouquet browser
- Added new video engine type Apple Media Player for transcoding
- Added transcode recordings with Vu+ transcoding
- Added option for alternate streaming URL for TVHeadend
- Added +15 minutes option to sleeptimer
- Fixed TVHeadend 3.8 program guide (press refresh button to clear cache)
- Default streaming port for TVHeadend is now by default equal to web interface port
- Improved TVHeadend support
- Updated video engine
- General bugfixes
